mapper.insert: insert into index_operation( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, p490, p491, p820, p492, p493, p494, p495, p496, p497, p498, p4981, p499, p4910, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{p490}, #{p491}, #{p820}, #{p492}, #{p493}, #{p494}, #{p495}, #{p496}, #{p497}, #{p498}, #{p4981}, #{p499}, #{p4910}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update index_operation set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, p490 = #{p490}, p491 = #{p491}, p820 = #{p820}, p492 = #{p492}, p493 = #{p493}, p494 = #{p494}, p495 = #{p495}, p496 = #{p496}, p497 = #{p497}, p498 = #{p498}, p4981 = #{p4981}, p499 = #{p499}, p4910 = #{p4910}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
